name: Chicken Fried Rice
description: Delight your palate with our savory Chicken Fried Rice, a wok-tossed masterpiece featuring tender chunks of seasoned chicken, crisp vegetables, and fragrant jasmine rice, delivering an irresistible fusion of flavors.

name: Veg Fried Rice
description: Experience the perfect medley of flavors in our Veg Fried Rice, a stir-fried delight featuring an array of fresh vegetables and aromatic jasmine rice, expertly seasoned for a wholesome and satisfying culinary experience.

name: Fish Biryani
description: Dive into the exquisite flavors of our Fish Biryani, where succulent pieces of perfectly seasoned fish are layered with fragrant basmati rice and aromatic spices, creating a symphony of taste in every spoonful.

name: Chicken Biryani
description: Savor the royal richness of our Chicken Biryani, a tantalizing blend of marinated chicken, aromatic basmati rice, and fragrant spices, delivering a regal feast for your senses.

name: Veg Biryani
description: Indulge in the aromatic delight of our Veg Biryani, where fragrant basmati rice meets a colorful melange of fresh vegetables and aromatic spices, creating a vegetarian symphony of flavors.

name: Garlic Fried Rice
description: Savor the aromatic allure of our Garlic Fried Rice, a wok-kissed sensation harmonizing fragrant jasmine rice with the rich essence of garlic, creating a flavorful and comforting dish.

name: Thai Style Fried Rice
description: Embark on a culinary journey with our Thai Styled Fried Rice, a tantalizing fusion of vibrant flavors, combining fragrant jasmine rice with exotic Thai spices, fresh vegetables, and succulent protein for a taste of Thailand in every bite.

name: Shanghai Fried Rice
description: Indulge in the bold flavors of our Shanghai Fried Rice, a tantalizing fusion of wok-tossed jasmine rice, succulent meats, and a medley of vegetables, delivering an authentic taste of Shanghai's culinary excellence.

name: Cheese Chilly
description: Delight in the perfect fusion of spice and gooey goodness with our Cheese Chilly, featuring crispy bites tossed in a zesty blend of peppers, onions, and savory spices, generously coated in melted cheese.

name: Chicken Tikka
description: Savor the authentic taste of India with our Chicken Tikka, where tender, marinated chicken pieces are grilled to perfection, delivering a symphony of aromatic spices and smoky flavors in every bite.

name: Paneer Tikka
description: Indulge in the rich and smoky flavors of India with our Paneer Tikka, featuring marinated cubes of succulent paneer charred to perfection, offering a delightful harmony of spices and textures.

name: Chicken Wings
description: Elevate your taste experience with our Chicken Wings, crispy on the outside, tender on the inside, and tossed in your choice of signature sauces for a flavorful and satisfying bite.

name: French Fries
description: Golden perfection in every bite, our French Fries offer a crispy outside and fluffy inside, seasoned to perfection, making them the ideal crunchy companion to any meal.

name: Onion Rings
description: Crispy indulgence awaits with our Onion Rings â€“ golden circles of perfectly battered and fried onions, offering a satisfying crunch in every savory bite.

name: Satay Chicken
description: Savor the irresistible fusion of flavors with our Satay Chicken, featuring tender skewered chicken marinated in a harmonious blend of exotic spices, grilled to perfection, and served with a delectable peanut sauce.

name: Simple Samosa (with chutney)
description: Experience the classic delight of our Simple Samosa, golden and crispy, paired with a tangy tamarind chutney, delivering a burst of traditional flavors in every bite.

name: Chole Samosa Chaat
description: Discover a delicious fusion with our Chole Samosa, where golden pockets are filled with spiced chickpeas, creating a perfect harmony of textures and flavors, served with tangy tamarind chutney.

name: Chole Aloo Tikki Chaat
description: Elevate your palate with our Chole Aloo Tikki Chaat, a tantalizing blend of crispy potato patties, aromatic chickpeas, and an explosion of chaat spices, topped with refreshing yogurt and chutneys.

name: Chicken Cheese Pizza
description: Satisfy your cravings with our Chicken Cheese Pizza, a mouthwatering fusion of succulent chicken, melted cheese, and a perfectly baked crust for the ultimate indulgence.

name: Mix Veg Pizza
description: Delight in a burst of flavors with our Mix Veg Pizza, a medley of colorful vegetables atop a crispy crust, generously layered with a blend of savory cheeses for a veggie lover's paradise.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Experience the classic simplicity of our Margherita Pizza, a perfect harmony of fresh mozzarella, sun-kissed tomatoes, fragrant basil, and a drizzle of extra-virgin olive oil on a thin, crisp crust.

name: Tomato Cheesy Pizza
description: Indulge in the ultimate comfort with our Tomato Cheesy Pizza, featuring a luscious blend of ripe tomatoes, gooey melted cheese, and a perfectly baked crust for a delightful burst of flavor in every bite.

name: Farmhouse Pizza
description: Savor the rustic charm of our Farmhouse Pizza, adorned with a medley of fresh vegetables, savory ham, and melted cheese, delivering a wholesome and flavorful countryside experience.

name: Paneer Tikka Butter Masala Pizza
description: Experience a fusion of flavors with our Paneer Tikka Butter Masala Pizza, marrying the succulence of paneer tikka with the richness of butter masala, creating a delectable symphony on a crispy crust.

name: Butter Chicken Pizza
description: Indulge in a culinary delight with our Butter Chicken Pizza, harmonizing the classic flavors of tender butter chicken pieces, creamy tomato sauce, and a perfect cheese blend on a delectably crispy crust.

name: Meat Blast Pizza
description: Unleash your carnivorous cravings with our Meat Blast Pizza, a flavor explosion featuring a tantalizing mix of savory meats, including pepperoni, sausage, ham, and seasoned ground beef, all on a bed of melted cheese and perfectly baked crust.

name: YumYum's Special Chicken Pizza
description: A culinary masterpiece featuring succulent chicken, a symphony of vibrant veggies, and our signature blend of cheeses on a perfectly crafted crust for an irresistibly delightful experience..

name: YumYum's Special Veg Pizza
description: A garden-fresh delight that captivates your palate with a medley of colorful vegetables, luscious cheese, and a perfect blend of herbs, all on a heavenly crust.

name: Dal Tadka
description: Lentils cooked to perfection in a flavorful tempered spice infusion, creating the classic and aromatic Indian dish, Dal Tadka.

name: Dal Makhni
description: Buttery black lentils and kidney beans slow-cooked to creamy perfection, enriched with aromatic spices in the indulgent North Indian delicacy, Dal Makhani.

name: Dal Fry
description: Black lentils delicately spiced and tempered to perfection, creating a savory and comforting experience in our enticing Dal Fry.

name: Paneer Tikka Masala
description: Tender paneer cubes marinated, grilled to perfection, and immersed in a rich, spiced tomato-based curry, presenting the delectable Paneer Tikka Masala on your plate.

name: Kadai Paneer
description: Succulent paneer cubes stir-fried with colorful bell peppers, onions, and aromatic spices, delivering a delightful symphony of flavors in our signature Kadai Paneer.

name: Shahi Paneer
description: Creamy and regal, Shahi Paneer is a royal feast featuring velvety cottage cheese cubes bathed in a luscious cashew and cream-based curry, harmonizing opulence with flavor.

name: Matar Paneer
description: Delight in the perfect union of soft paneer and vibrant green peas in a mildly spiced tomato-based curry, capturing the essence of our Matar Paneer.

name: Palak Paneer
description: Experience the wholesome goodness of fresh spinach puree blended with paneer cubes, harmonizing in a nutritious and flavorful Palak Paneer delight.

name: Paneer Bhurji
description: Savor the delightful medley of crumbled paneer infused with aromatic spices, onions, and tomatoes, creating a flavorful and satisfying Paneer Bhurji experience.

name: Sev Bhaji
description: Indulge in the tantalizing blend of crispy sev atop a spicy and flavorful vegetable curry, elevating your palate with the unique and delicious Sev Bhaji.

name: Mix Veg
description: An enticing medley of garden-fresh vegetables simmered to perfection in a savory blend of spices, presenting our wholesome and flavorful Mix Veg delight.

name: Bhindi Masala
description: Enjoy the exquisite flavors of tender okra cooked to perfection in a spiced tomato-based curry, showcasing the delectable Bhindi Masala on your plate.

name: Malai Kofta
description: Indulge in the richness of velvety kofta balls crafted from paneer and vegetables, bathed in a creamy tomato-based sauce, offering a luxurious Malai Kofta experience.

name: Jeera Aloo
description: Experience the perfect fusion of golden-fried potatoes infused with the aromatic warmth of cumin seeds, creating a delightful Jeera Aloo side dish.

name: Kaju Curry
description: Indulge in the richness of cashew nuts enveloped in a luscious and aromatic curry, elevating your dining experience with our delectable Kaju Curry.

name: Kaju Paneer
description: Delight in the decadent fusion of cashews and paneer, simmered in a rich and creamy tomato-based curry, presenting the exquisite Kaju Paneer on your plate.

name: Veg Kofta
description: Savor the artful blend of vegetable koftas, deep-fried to golden perfection, and immersed in a flavorful curry, showcasing our delectable Veg Kofta.

name: Aloo Mutter
description: Enjoy the comforting harmony of tender potatoes and green peas in a spiced tomato-based curry, bringing warmth and flavor to our Aloo Mutter.

name: Mushroom Masala
description: Delight your senses with the earthy goodness of mushrooms simmered in a flavorful and aromatic masala, presenting our savory Mushroom Masala.

name: Mushroom Bhaji
description: Savor the delightful medley of mushrooms stir-fried with aromatic spices and herbs, creating a flavorful and satisfying Mushroom Bhaji.

name: Kadai Mushroom
description: Experience the bold and aromatic blend of mushrooms, bell peppers, and onions stir-fried to perfection in a spicy kadai masala, showcasing our delectable Kadai Mushroom.

name: Mushroom Matar
description: Indulge in the enticing combination of tender mushrooms and green peas, bathed in a savory tomato-based curry, elevating your dining experience with our flavorful Mushroom Matar.

name: Mushroom Tikka Masala
description: Succulent mushroom pieces marinated, grilled to perfection, and immersed in a rich, spiced tomato-based curry, presenting the delectable Mushroom Tikka Masala on your plate.

name: Sarson Da Saag
description: Embrace the traditional flavors of Punjab with our Sarson da Saag, a delectable dish featuring mustard greens simmered to perfection and infused with aromatic spices.

name: Soya Chaap
description: Savor the protein-packed goodness of Soya Chaap, marinated and grilled to perfection, offering a delightful fusion of flavors and textures in every bite.

name: Channa Masala
description: Delight in the hearty goodness of chickpeas simmered in a spiced tomato-based curry, capturing the essence of our flavorful Channa Masala.

name: Punjabi Karela Masala
description: Savor the bold flavors of Punjabi Karela Masala, featuring bitter gourd slices stir-fried to perfection with aromatic spices, delivering a delightful culinary experience.

name: Baingan Bharta
description: Indulge in the smoky goodness of Baingan Bharta Masala, where roasted eggplant is skillfully blended with aromatic spices, offering a rich and flavorful culinary delight.

name: Gobhi Manchurian
description: Delight in the crispy perfection of Gobhi Manchurian, featuring cauliflower florets coated in a tangy and flavorful Manchurian sauce, delivering a delightful fusion experience.

name: Aloo Methi
description: Savor the delightful blend of tender potatoes and fresh fenugreek leaves in a spiced tomato-based curry, presenting our flavorful Aloo Methi Masala.

name: Dum Aloo
description: Indulge in the rich and aromatic Dum Aloo Masala, featuring baby potatoes slow-cooked in a flavorful blend of spices and a velvety tomato-based curry.

name: Veg Garlic Kofta
description: Savor the exquisite harmony of vegetable-stuffed garlic-infused koftas, bathed in a luscious curry, presenting our flavorful Veg Garlic Kofta.

name: Babycorn Mushroom Masala
description: Experience the delightful fusion of tender baby corn and mushrooms in a rich and flavorful masala, creating a savory sensation in our Baby Corn Mushroom Masala.

name: Kaddu
description: Enjoy the culinary delight of Forkaddu, featuring tender pieces of pumpkin delicately spiced and cooked to perfection, adding a flavorful touch to your dining experience.

name: Tinda Ki Sabzi
description: Savor the simplicity of Tinda, a light and flavorful dish showcasing baby Indian round gourds stir-fried with aromatic spices, offering a delightful addition to your meal.

name: Butter Chicken
description: Indulge in the culinary classic, Butter Chicken, featuring tender chicken pieces in a velvety tomato and cream-based curry, delivering a rich and flavorful experience.

name: Kadai Chicken
description: Savor the bold and aromatic Kadai Chicken, where succulent pieces of chicken are stir-fried with colorful bell peppers and onions in a spiced curry, offering a delightful culinary journey.

name: Pepper Chicken
description: Experience the perfect balance of succulent chicken marinated and cooked with a peppery kick, creating a flavorful and aromatic Pepper Chicken sensation.

name: Tawa Chicken
description: Delight in the sizzling Tawa Chicken, where marinated chicken is expertly seared on the griddle with aromatic spices, offering a tantalizing and flavorful experience.

name: Tawa Chicken Boneless
description: Savor the sizzling perfection of boneless Tawa Chicken, expertly seared with aromatic spices on the griddle, delivering a flavorful and succulent dining experience.

name: Chicken Keema
description: Indulge in the savory goodness of Chicken Keema, a delectable dish featuring minced chicken cooked with aromatic spices, offering a flavorful culinary delight.

name: Punjabi Chicken Curry
description: Relish the authentic flavors of Punjab with our Punjabi Chicken Curry, featuring tender chicken simmered in a rich and aromatic tomato-based gravy, delivering a delightful culinary experience.

name: Rara Chicken
description: Indulge in the aromatic delight of Rara Chicken, featuring tender pieces of chicken slow-cooked in a rich and flavorful blend of spices, offering a culinary sensation.

name: Masala Chilli Chicken
description: Savor the perfect blend of succulent chicken stir-fried with aromatic spices and fiery chillies in our Masala Chilli Chicken, offering a delightful burst of flavors.

name: Home Style Chicken
description: Savor the comforting taste of Home-Style Chicken, a nostalgic culinary experience featuring tenderly cooked chicken with traditional spices and flavors.

name: Dahi Chicken
description: Succulent chicken pieces cooked in a creamy yogurt-based sauce, infused with aromatic spices for a flavorful and indulgent dining experience.

name: Cream Chicken
description: Tender chicken simmered in a luscious, velvety cream sauce, delicately spiced to perfection for a rich and satisfying dish.

name: Kali Mirch Chicken
description: A savory symphony of tender chicken cooked in a rich black pepper-infused gravy, delivering a bold and aromatic culinary delight.

name: Mutton Gurda Kaleji
description: A delectable medley of tender mutton kidney and liver, expertly cooked with aromatic spices, offering a flavorsome and hearty culinary experience.

name: Rara Mutton
description: Succulent mutton pieces slow-cooked to perfection in a rich and spicy curry, featuring minced meat for a delightful texture and robust flavor.

name: Mutton Curry
description: Tender mutton pieces simmered in a flavorful curry, harmoniously spiced to create a classic and hearty culinary delight.

name: Plain Chapati
description: Soft, homemade whole wheat flatbread - a staple of Indian cuisine.

name: Butter Chapati
description: A soft, chewy khari roti made from whole wheat flour, cooked in a tawa and served with a side of tangy pickle.

name: Onion Chapati
description: A soft, chewy onion and corriander roti made from whole wheat flour, cooked in a tawa and served with a side of tangy pickle.

name: Missi Chapati
description: Missi Roti is a North Indian flatbread prepared with chickpea flour, onions, ginger, kasuri methi, and a few spices.

name: Makki Di Roti
description: Makki di roti is made from makai atta cornmeal flour, salt, and water, and once it's done, it is brushed with ghee and traditionally served piping hot with sarson da saag (cooked mustard leaves and spices), especially during the winter months.

name: Bajra Di Roti
description: Bajra di roti is made from makai atta cornmeal flour, salt, and water, and once it's done, it is brushed with ghee and traditionally served piping hot with sarson da saag (cooked mustard leaves and spices), especially during the winter months.

name: Plain Naan
description: This naan recipe is everything it promises: fluffy, chewy, bubbly with the signature elasticity that you get from tandoor cooked naan!

name: Butter Naan
description: Soft and fluffy Indian bread, brushed with butter for a delectable and indulgent taste experience.

name: Garlic Naan
description: Buttery naan infused with aromatic garlic, adding a flavorful twist to this classic Indian bread.

name: Onion Naan
description: Deliciously crafted naan infused with savory onions, enhancing the traditional Indian bread with a delightful crunch and flavor.

name: Aloo Parantha
description: Savor the warmth of Indian comfort food with our Aloo Parantha, a delightful unleavened flatbread stuffed with seasoned mashed potatoes, pan-fried to perfection.

name: Laccha Parantha
description: Indulge in the crispy layers of our Laccha Parantha, a flaky and flavorful Indian flatbread that adds a delightful crunch to your dining experience.

name: Paneer Parantha
description: Experience the perfect blend of softness and spice with our Paneer Parantha, a scrumptious unleavened flatbread stuffed with seasoned cottage cheese, bringing authentic flavors to your plate.
